title: Smart DNS for the New Network Edge
description: People depend on the internet for just about everything: interacting, learning, transacting, traveling, working, and more. At the same time, the wireless evolution to 4G -- and soon 5G and Wi-Fi everywhere -- has given birth to an era of connected cars, smart sensors, and a multitude of other "things" that are growing rapidly and expanding in utility and scope. Leading network providers see new market opportunities with new business models to monetize new services that combine networks and commerce, including:
author: Bruce Van Nice
